awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 3 wins.

fullplot: When a full-scale war is engaged by the evil Scarran Empire, the Peacekeeper Alliance has but one hope: reassemble human astronaut John Crichton, once sucked into the Peacekeeper galaxy through a wormhole. Crichton's task: Get the entire Peacekeeper race to safety before the last war of an era brings and end to the universe.

title: Farscape: The Peacekeeper Wars
